loginForm.loginWelcome: Welcome! Log in to your account
loginForm.loginExistingAccount: Log in to your existing account to check current orders and more
loginForm.notAuthorized: You are not logged in. Please log in to continue.

accountSection.accountWelcome: Welcome to your dashboard — your one-stop center for all your latest account activities

heroSection.heroTitle: Personalized Integration Platform for Life in Switzerland
heroSection.heroInfo: Instead of bureaucratic chaos – clear roadmap, templates, support, and training tailored exactly for you.

categoriesCard1.categoriesDescription: Templates and explanations of housing rental agreements in Switzerland.

categoriesCard2.categoriesDescription: Forms and instructions for obtaining residence, work permits, etc.

categoriesCard3.categoriesDescription: Sample letters for communication with government authorities.

categoriesCard4.categoriesDescription: Ready-made examples and templates for CVs and motivation letters.

categoriesCard5.categoriesDescription: Templates and translations of documents for opening accounts, loans, etc.

categoriesCard6.categoriesDescription: Documents and templates for insurance companies.

categoriesCard7.categoriesDescription: Examples of tax declarations, forms, and explanations of tax terms.

formatSection.title: Document Format
formatSection.description: All documents in our library are provided in PDF format with online preview. This allows viewing content without the need to download, which is convenient and saves time.

commentsSection.title: Comments and Explanations
commentsSection.description: Each field in the document is accompanied by detailed comments and explanations that help fill out the form correctly and avoid mistakes. This is especially important for legal and official documents.

translationsSection.title: Translations
translationsSection.description: For greater convenience, we provide translations of key documents and forms into Ukrainian, English, and other languages. It is especially important that original documents are often available in German or French — we provide accurate translations for better understanding.

accessibilitySection.title: Convenience and Accessibility
accessibilitySection.description: Our documents are adapted for use on both desktops and mobile devices. The online preview is integrated directly on the site, making working with documents fast and comfortable.

coursesMapSection.coursesMapTitle: Language schools in the canton of Zurich

contactUsSection.contactUsText: If you have any questions, suggestions, or need assistance, please contact us. We’re always happy to help!
contactUsSection.contactUsAttempts: You have used all your attempts!
contactUsSection.contactUsTelegram: Message us on Telegram for quick assistance!

roadmapHeroSection.roadmapHeroText: A key functional module providing step-by-step instructions for migrant integration in Switzerland.

medicineSection.insuranceText: Health insurance is mandatory from the first day of your stay in Switzerland. You can compare rates and choose insurance on Comparis.ch.
medicineSection.familyDoctorText: It is recommended to find a family doctor near your place of residence. Use the map below with blue markers for this.
medicineSection.emergencyText: For emergency medical assistance, call 144. Pharmacies are marked with green markers on the map.
medicineSection.pharmaciesDetailsText: Details of the nearest pharmacies can also be found on your canton’s websites or using OpenStreetMap.

legalSection.legalText: If you have any questions or need advice, please contact our support service.
